025package com.github.siroshun09.event4j.bus;
026
027import com.github.siroshun09.event4j.key.Key;
028import com.github.siroshun09.event4j.listener.Listener;
029import com.github.siroshun09.event4j.priority.Priority;
030import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
031import org.jetbrains.annotations.UnmodifiableView;
032
033import java.util.List;
034import java.util.function.Predicate;
035
036/**
037 * A subscriber to manage {@link Listener}s.
038 *
039 * @param <E> the type of event
040 */
041@SuppressWarnings("UnusedReturnValue")
042public interface EventSubscriber<E> {
043
044    /**
045     * Gets the event {@link Class} of this subscriber.
046     *
047     * @return the event {@link Class} of this subscriber
048     */
049    @NotNull Class<E> getEventClass();
050
051    /**
052     * Posts the event instance to subscribed listeners.
053     *
054     * @param event the event instance
055     * @return the {@link PostResult}
056     * @throws IllegalStateException if this subscriber is already closed
057     */
058    @NotNull PostResult<E> post(@NotNull E event);
059
060    /**
061     * Subscribes the new {@link Listener}.
062     *
063     * @param key      the key
064     * @param listener the {@link Listener} to subscribe
065     * @return the {@link SubscribedListener}
066     * @throws IllegalStateException if this subscriber is already closed
067     */
068    @NotNull SubscribedListener<E> subscribe(@NotNull Key key, @NotNull Listener<E> listener);
069
070    /**
071     * Subscribes the new {@link Listener}.
072     *
073     * @param key      the key
074     * @param listener the {@link Listener} to subscribe
075     * @param priority the priority of the {@link Listener}
076     * @return the {@link SubscribedListener}
077     * @throws IllegalStateException if this subscriber is already closed
078     */
079    @NotNull SubscribedListener<E> subscribe(@NotNull Key key, @NotNull Listener<E> listener, @NotNull Priority priority);
080
081    /**
082     * Subscribes the new {@link Listener}.
083     *
084     * @param key           the key
085     * @param listener      the {@link Listener} to subscribe
086     * @param priorityValue the priority value of the {@link Listener}
087     * @return the {@link SubscribedListener}
088     * @throws IllegalStateException if this subscriber is already closed
089     */
090    @NotNull SubscribedListener<E> subscribe(@NotNull Key key, @NotNull Listener<E> listener, int priorityValue);
091
092    /**
093     * Unsubscribes the specified {@link SubscribedListener}.
094     *
095     * @param subscribedListener the {@link SubscribedListener} to unsubscribe
096     * @return if the listener has been unsubscribed, returns {@code true}, otherwise {@code false}
097     * @throws IllegalStateException if this subscriber is already closed
098     */
099    boolean unsubscribe(@NotNull SubscribedListener<E> subscribedListener);
100
101    /**
102     * Unsubscribes the {@link Listener}s that subscribed with the given {@link Key}.
103     *
104     * @param key the key to unsubscribe
105     * @return if the listeners has been unsubscribed, returns {@code true}. otherwise {@code false}
106     * @throws IllegalStateException if this subscriber is already closed
107     */
108    boolean unsubscribeAll(@NotNull Key key);
109
110    /**
111     * Unsubscribes all listeners that satisfy the given {@link Predicate}.
112     *
113     * @param predicate a predicate which returns true for listeners to be unsubscribed
114     * @return if the listeners has been unsubscribed, returns {@code true}. otherwise {@code false}
115     * @throws IllegalStateException if this subscriber is already closed
116     */
117    boolean unsubscribeIf(@NotNull Predicate<SubscribedListener<?>> predicate);
118
119    /**
120     * Gets the list of subscribed listeners.
121     *
122     * @return the list of subscribed listeners.
123     */
124    @NotNull @UnmodifiableView List<SubscribedListener<E>> getSubscribedListeners();
125
126    /**
127     * Checks if this subscriber is closed.
128     *
129     * @return if this subscriber is closed, returns {@code true}, otherwise {@code false}
130     */
131    boolean isClosed();
132}
